node.title: Biden announces sanctions, says Russia has begun invasion of Ukraine
node.description: "Whatever Russia does next, we're ready to respond with unity, clarity and conviction," President Biden said.
node.content: ["President Biden on Tuesday announced new sanctions against Russia as a result of President Vladimir Putin's latest actions concerning Ukraine.\u00a0", "\"This is the beginning of a Russian invasion of Ukraine ... so I'm going to begin to impose sanctions in response,\" Mr. Biden said at the White House, in response to Putin's decision to send \"peacekeeping\" forces into Ukraine's eastern breakaway regions hours after he formally\u00a0recognized Luhansk and Donetsk as independent\u00a0from Ukraine on Monday.", "Mr. Biden said the sanctions, closely coordinated with allies and partners, will target two large banks in Russia and its sovereign debt.\u00a0", "\"That means we cut off Russia's government from western financing,\" the president said.\u00a0", "A White House official said the sanctions the president announced Tuesday would be \"swift and severe.\" The U.S. is imposing sanctions on Russia's elite and their family members, and a senior administration official told reporters on a call Tuesday that export controls are also being considered.\u00a0", "Additionally, the U.S. is moving its forces already deployed in Europe to NATO countries bordering Russia on the west, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania, in response to Putin's refusal to withdraw troops from Belarus. The move is intended to reassure those countries that they will be protected if Russia attacks.\u00a0", "\"Let me be clear \u2014 these are totally defensive moves on our part,\" Mr. Biden said. \"We have no intention of fighting Russia.\"\u00a0", "The president added, \"Whatever Russia does next, we're ready to respond with unity, clarity and conviction.\"", "Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Tuesday that a previously scheduled meeting with his Russian counterpart, Sergey Lavrov, would no longer take place \"now that we see the invasion beginning.\" The meeting was intended to lay the groundwork for a potential diplomatic solution \u2014 or at least see if it was possible for Mr. Biden and Putin to hold a summit.", "\"Now that we see the invasions beginning in Russia ... it does not make sense to go forward with that meeting at this time,\" Blinken said. \"I consulted with our allies and partners all agree.\" He said he sent a letter to Lavrov Tuesday informing him of this.\u00a0", "White House press secretary Jen Psaki on Tuesday would not say what Russian action would trigger the fullest extent of U.S. sanctions.\u00a0", "The recognition of the breakaway territories as independent was soon followed by new U.S. sanctions ordered by Mr. Biden Monday night. The executive order he signed Monday bars new investment and trade and financing by individuals in the U.S. in Luhansk and Donetsk, both in the Donbas region in Eastern Ukraine.\u00a0", "European Commissioner for Justice Didier Reynders called Russia's declaration of Donetsk and Luhnask's independence \u2014 and the decision to send forces into the breakaway regions \u2014 an \"act of war.\"", "Meanwhile, Germany has halted the Nord Stream 2 pipeline, which was constructed under the Baltic Sea to bring natural gas directly from Russia to Germany. Mr. Biden had said there wouldn't be a Nord Stream 2 if Russia invades Ukraine, but that decision ultimately rested with Germany. German Chancellor Olaf Scholz had initially resisted making an explicit promise\u00a0to suspend the pipeline, despite pressure from allies, since the pipeline would provide natural gas at a lower cost to Germany.", "\u2014 CBS News' Sara Cook contributed to this report."]
